flawed_nl_solution:
At the meeting, 200-100=<<200-100=100>>100 people decided to have a snack.
20 new people came in to snack and the area had 100+20=<<100+20=140>>140 of them eating.
140/2=<<140/2=70>>70 people got full and left.
10 more new people came to join in the snacking so 70+10=<<10+70=80>>80 people were eating.
After 30 people left, 80-30=<<80-30=50>>50 people who were eating remained.
In the end, only 50/2=<<50/2=25>>25 kept eating.
#### 25

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 120, not 140. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
